entries.meaning: (uncountable) Any political system that is not democratic.
examples: In democracy, the citizens get relatively higher benefits; the elites benefit in nondemocracy.

entries.meaning: (countable) A regime, country etc. that is not democratic.
examples: Jeffrey Toobin, a lawyer and legal commentator, called the move “a grotesque abuse of power by the president of the United States”. “This is the kind of thing that goes on in non-democracies,” Toobin said.
